dataObject.content: For the first time the annual risk report, compiled by the World Economic Forum (WEF), found the top five concerns were all environmental, from extreme weather to biodiversity loss and events like oil spills and radioactive contamination.

annotationData.content: {"category":{"label":"Unbiased"},"rationale":"This is unbiased because it is about a report from the WEF stating the top five environmental concerns, rather than a specific view about the details of the report."}

{"category":{"label":"Unbiased"},"rationale":"Everything in this story is verifiable. We can expect here also that a well knowned and trusted organisation like the WEF would produce a transparent report. Unbiased"}
